titles.title: Homebuyer Tax Credit Expansion Act of 2009
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the first-time homebuyer tax credit and to modify the credit by repealing the first-time homebuyer requirement and waiving recapture.
Homebuyer Tax Credit Expansion Act of 2009

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Homebuyer Tax Credit Expansion Act of 2009 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) extend the first-time homebuyer tax credit to all individuals who purchase a principal residence (currently, only first-time homebuyers as so defined); (2) repeal recapture requirements for such credit; and (3) extend such credit through 2011.
